Event.name: Pre_giving
Event.definition:
<def-root>The stage of giving just before the <fen>Donor</fen> discontinues possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>, yielding it to the <fen>Recipient</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Donor
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The individual that has possession of the <fen>Theme</fen> and is about to transfer possession to the <fen>Recipient</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The entity which is in the possession of the <fen>Donor</fen>, which later ends up in the possession of the <fen>Recipient</fen>.
</def-root>

Arg.name: Recipient
Arg.definition: <def-root>The individual who is about to come into possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE indicates the <fen>Time</fen> when the Pre_giving event occurs. </def-root>
